sentences.en: a cold hearth full of cinders
sentences.cn: 冰冷的炉床，里面全是炭渣

sentences.en: At least 50,000 acres have been burnt to a cinder.
sentences.cn: 至少五万亩土地被烧成焦土.

sentences.en: Beside the lotus pond there is a small tortuous cinder path.
sentences.cn: 沿着荷塘,是一条曲折的小煤屑路.

sentences.en: But he took off his sweater and they began jogging slowly around the cinder track.
sentences.cn: 不过,他还是脱了厚毛衣,两人开始沿煤渣跑道慢慢地晃着跑起来.

sentences.en: Cinder blocks are called breeze blocks in Britain.
I firmly believe that she'll pay more benefits to each cinder!
sentences.cn: 我坚信,她会给予每一位词友更多的利益!

sentences.en: Shield volcano, cinder cones and composite volcanoes.
sentences.cn: 盾状火山 、 火山渣锥和复合火山.

sentences.en: The cake was burnt to a cinder (= completely burnt ) .
The cake was burnt to a cinder.
The cakes were burnt to a cinder.
The cinder viscosity has important practical significance on the iron - smelting process.
sentences.cn: 炉渣黏度对炼铁生产有重大实际意义.

sentences.en: The extracting iron from pyrite cinder by reductive roasting and sulfuric acid leaching was investigated.
sentences.cn: 研究了高温还原焙烧、硫酸浸取提取硫铁矿烧渣中的铁.

sentences.en: The new technology for the preparation of superfine ferric oxide from pyrite cinder is studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了用硫铁矿烧渣为原料,制取超细氧化铁红的新工艺.

sentences.en: The pyrite cinder is the industrial solid waste.
sentences.cn: 硫铁矿烧渣是硫酸工业的废弃物.

sentences.en: The sulphur in pyrite cinder occurred in the form of pyrite and anhydrite.
sentences.cn: 铜陵硫酸渣中的硫主要以硬石膏和黄铁矿两种矿物存在.

sentences.en: You've burnt my toast to a cinder!
You've burnt the toast to a cinder , ie so that it is hard and black.

trans.tran_cn: 煤渣，炭渣，煤渣路，煤渣跑道
trans.tran_en: a very small piece of burnt wood, coal etc
